name: Jaidz
content:
Jaidz

Fearless Claw

Source Inner Sea Gods pg. 322
Pathfinder Wiki Jaidz

Details

Alignment NG
Pantheon Empyreal Lords
Areas of Concern Cowards, the untested, youths
Domains Glory, Good, Protection, Travel
Subdomains Agathion, Defense, Exploration, Hubris (Glory)*, Purity
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Short sword
Symbol Path between two trees
Sacred Animal(s) Black tiger
Sacred Color(s) Brown, green

Obedience

Mark your arms and legs with white chalk, drawing patterns that mirror the flow of spiritual energy you experience as you meditate on the teachings of Jaidz. Trace over these lines once again with a tiger's fang, but do not break the skin. Gain a +4 sacred bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity made with natural attacks.

Boons - Celestial Obedience

Mystery Cultist

Source Chronicle of the Righteous pg. 16
1: Dauntless (Sp) remove fear 3/day, darkvision 2/day, or heroism 1/day
2: Courageous Roar (Sp) You can cast still greater heroism three times per day. This ability is the equivalent of a 7th-level spell.
3: Holy Terror (Sp) Once per day you can inscribe a symbol of Jaidz in the air that acts like a symbol of fear. The symbol appears as the glowing outline of Jaidz's holy symbol and hovers stationary wherever you inscribe it. This spell requires no material components and has a casting time of only 1 minute. You can attune up to 10 creatures to the symbol without extending its casting time.

For Followers of Jaidz

Heroic Interposition
